title: Awful Jobs (CRE105)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In our fifth episode, Joe Mande, Jeff Simmermon, Tracy Rowland, Jessica Delfino, and William Mullin tell true stories about working hard for the money.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Tracy Rowland, William Mullin, Jessica Delfino, Air for Ants, Beautiful Vision, Jeff Simmermon, Jordan Cooper, Alec Gross, Peter Aguero, Joe Mande, Kevin Allison, Marshall York)
